LanguageData.BackPacks.label: back packs
LanguageData.BackPacks.description: Research a way to manufacture some backpacks.
LanguageData.BallistaTurret.label: manned ballista turret
LanguageData.BallistaTurret.description: Research a way to build a mannable ballista turret.
LanguageData.BasicHunterArmaments.label: hunter's workbench
LanguageData.BasicHunterArmaments.description: An introductory research which allows you to build a hunters workbench, and craft simple components.
LanguageData.CannonTurret.label: manned cannon turret
LanguageData.CannonTurret.description: Research a way to build a mannable cannon turret, along with a way to manufacture some devious cannon shells.
LanguageData.Elixirz.label: elixirs
LanguageData.Elixirz.description: Research a way to brew some effective elixirs for combat, and other conveniences.
LanguageData.ExoticWeaponry.label: exotic weaponry
LanguageData.ExoticWeaponry.description: Research a way to craft some bizarre-looking firearms that are more effective in combat than they look.
LanguageData.Flamer.label: hand-held flamers
LanguageData.Flamer.description: Research a way to craft a hand-held flame thrower.
LanguageData.FlintlockArmaments.label: flintlock armaments
LanguageData.FlintlockArmaments.description: Research a way to craft basic flintlock firearms.
LanguageData.FrontierDefenses.label: frontier defenses
LanguageData.FrontierDefenses.description: Research a way to build some sturdy defenses that can protect you from the early horrors of the rim.
LanguageData.GatlingTurret.label: manned gatling turret
LanguageData.GatlingTurret.description: Research a way to build a mannable gatling turret.
LanguageData.HeavyWeaponry.label: heavy weaponry
LanguageData.HeavyWeaponry.description: Research a way to craft some devastating heavy weapons used by the powder keg hunters.
LanguageData.HunterMelee.label: melee weapons
LanguageData.HunterMelee.description: Research a way to manufacture some melee weapons used by the hunterphages.
LanguageData.HuntersApparel.label: hunter's apparel
LanguageData.HuntersApparel.description: Research a way to manufacture hunter-based apparels.
LanguageData.HuntersApparelBlack.label: black hunter's apparel
LanguageData.HuntersApparelBlack.description: Research a way to manufacture a few black variant hunter-based apparels.
LanguageData.PercussionArmaments.label: percussion armaments
LanguageData.PercussionArmaments.description: Research a way to craft percussion firearms.
LanguageData.PowderkegApparels.label: powder keg hunter's apparel
LanguageData.PowderkegApparels.description: Research a way to manufacture some apparels worn by the powder keg hunters.
LanguageData.RevolverArmaments.label: revolver armaments
LanguageData.RevolverArmaments.description: Research a way to craft revolver-type firearms.
LanguageData.RipperBlades.label: ripper blades
LanguageData.RipperBlades.description: Research a way to manufacture some deadly ripper-type melee weapons.
LanguageData.ShadowBlades.label: shadow blades
LanguageData.ShadowBlades.description: Research a way to manufacture some melee weapons used by the shadow walkers.
LanguageData.ShadowWalkerApparels.label: shadow walkers apparel
LanguageData.ShadowWalkerApparels.description: Research a way to manufacture apparels worn by the mysterious shadow walkers.
